Message.Title: Blood on Obama's Hands
Message.Msg: Obama knew on Sept 5 another attack was coming on 9/11, yet he did nothing. Four people are dead. He has taken out every ruler in the middle east and lead the way for the Muslim Brotherhood. Sharia law is their law. Anyone who can't see this is blind. Obama doesn't bother to take care of business at the White House and refuses to meet with Israel's leader, and yes, Israel asked, Obama said no, when the Muslim Brotherhood has had multiple meetings with White House staff. With the middle east in crisis, Obama continues to campaign in Nevada. Then to cover up his incompetence, he blames Romney for making a statement in support of the United States. Obama has blood on his hands.It is time for this president to be voted out, kicked out, just OUT! Only an anti-American would see this another way. Of course, we already know there are plenty of those stirring up trouble in this country. How much more can this country take? The unemployment numbers are being rigged, inflation is at the grocery store, Obama's team has loaded this country to fail. The stock market is being held up to try and get Obama re-elected because there is no economic reason it should be sky high as it is and is just waiting for the thread it's hanging on....to break. There is no other explanation. That doesn't even cover the 16 Trillion in debt on this country that is about to devalue our currency to equal Mexico City.He is even worse than Jimmy Carter. It is time to get this bad actor out of our country's business.He has failed on everything. Could he do worse, I hope not, but I keep thinking he can't do any worse....but he does.There is no defense of this president that makes sense...except that they're democrat......that's not a sufficient defense.

Message.Title: What's fueling the GOP decline?...
Message.Msg: Why are the Republicans losing ground in this election? Let us count the ways…or, simply read the many lies posted just yesterday here out of a last gasp sense of desperation. Americans are not as stupid as you far-right wackos need them to be to believe your nonsense. I’ll repeat this again – the lunatics you are pandering to are ALREADY on your side! The middle-ground undecideds are being forced into the other camp because rather than discuss issues, you continue the birther nonsense. Read what you wrote here. It’s unbelievable that you think you can influence anyone saying insane things: “Obama was a terrible student and graduated at the bottom of his class from Occidental College to Columbia and then Harvard” – the Geoff holt imposter, who then asks, with no evidence other than him saying so, that if that isn’t true , WE need to show some evidence to disprove it. Dude, were you drunk ALL day long yesterday? Read my post you were replying to. I cited sources, you didn’t! “Obama has sealed his records…because his school records are under his real name Barry Soetoro…What is he hiding? – is3487, spewing more Birther foolishness to cover for Romney’s HUGE mistake of not showing his tax returns. That only forces voters to understand that the only possible reason to hide them is that they would hurt him even more than NOT showing them is already doing. There is NO other possible sane political reason – and claims of privacy are laughable – check out every other Presidential candidate. I’ll give you the link of the Tax History Project – oh, guess not, courtesy of the wonderful Yahoo board improvements. I guess these multiple-aliased clowns who pass along these fictional accounts are delighted with not being able to post URL’s. “(Obama) is purposely trying to torpedo this Great Country.” - robfisk “Hispanics are turning against Obummer” - robfisk (Right, rob, a poll of Hispanics Sept. 10th shows Obama at 66%, Romney at 29, with 5% undecided.) Romney has about as much chance of winning amongst Hispanics as you do of convincing anyone that you’re actually a person of color. And here are three doozies from windyfrostt: “Blood on Obama’s hands. Obama knew on Sept 5 another attack was coming on 9/11, yet he did nothing” “…the Muslim Brotherhood has had multiple meetings with White House staff” And, get THIS one!!!!!!: “The stock market is being held up to try and get Obama re-elected#$%$ The socialist/m#slim/commies are running Wall Street now?????? I had no idea. What stocks are they pumpin’? Collectivism commodities? Again, you folks writing this crap can’t be as stupid as those for whom you intend it. Then again, you can’t be too bright if you don’t understand those extremists are already your most ardent supporters. But everyone else is saying, “Who are these crazy people and why do we want them to run America?

Message.Title: Romney's response to Libya and Egypt...
Message.Msg: Asked whether Romney's attacks were irresponsible, President Obama said, "I'll let the American people judge that.” And they are: “The conventional wisdom emerged in Washington almost immediately on Wednesday: Mitt Romney's handling of the violence in Egypt and Libya was a disaster.” - CBS “The comments were a big mistake, and the decision to double down on them was an even bigger mistake," Steve Schmidt, senior campaign strategist to Sen. John McCain. "If you think the eye-rolling at Romney is just coming from the MSM, call up some Republican foreign policy hands,” – Ben Smith “How could this happen?” asked Christopher Ruddy, editor of Newsmax Media Inc., a conservative web operation. “If I could put my finger on it, I would say the Romney campaign has been poorly managed. They haven’t staged their candidate well, and their messaging has been incoherent, to put it nicely.” Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell of Kentucky said Obama "correctly tightened the security overseas." Asked about Romney's remarks, he declined to answer and walked toward his office in the Capitol. "I don't feel that Mr. Romney has been doing himself any favors in the past few hours," she said. – conservative columnist Peggy Noonan, on Fox, no less. "I saw the statement he put out last night and I thought it was maybe a low-level press person who put this out and today they would correct the damage. Instead they're digging the hole deeper. I mean you can't really play partisan politics in U.S. foreign policy." - Darrell West, vice president of Governance Studies at the Brookings Institution. "Mr. Romney’s rhetoric on embassy attacks discredits his campaign.” – Washington Post Romney's account didn't mesh completely with events in Cairo."No, I was not aware that it (the embassy's statement) was issued before there were any attacks." Ohio Republican Rob Portman “Romney appears to have launched a political attack even before facts of embassy violence were known…then uses day to issue vague foreign policy vision.” – David Gregory “Republican are hoping that the North Africa story will quickly fade away — but they fear the worst. “This could be a game-changer,” Alex Castellanos, a 2008 Romney campaign adviser who is not employed by the campaign this year. “Romney's assault on Obama was rare among Republicans. Sarah Palin and Republican National Committee Chairman Reince Priebus joined him in condemning the president, but no other significant GOP leader thought it prudent to immediately single out the president for criticism. House Speaker John Boehner (R-Ohio), House Majority Leader Eric Cantor (R-Va.) and Sen. Marco Rubio (R-Fla.) all put out statements on the crisis, none attacking Obama.” – Huff. Post And the slide to oblivion continues. Wait until the debates!

Topic.Title: Embassy attack - Romney does Obama's job

Message.Msg: If you guys were merely as stupid as you sound, some people might at least feel sorry for you. Sadly, you know full well what you are saying is a lie, and you proceed anyhow, because the only interest you know isn’t for America, but self-interest. And you have the audacity to criticize the President as being a foreigner, among other things. The most Un-American people in the nation today are you guys. “Stupid Hillary actually believes this attack was because of a movie…” – the fake Geoff Holt – Now if people are telling the truth, why do they need to use copycat aliases? Please tell us, fake Geoff. The comments released from Cairo (not from the White House) were to let the (at that point) still peaceful protestors know that nobody (myself included) thinks making intentionally incendiary anti-religious statements helps anything. They had not attacked the Embassy in Cairo at that point, and what happened in Libya had NOT happened. What don’t you (and Mitt Romney) understand about that? As I said, you DO know that, but choose to lie about it anyhow. From John McCain about Libya and the Presidents reaction (I believe he was your nominee last time, wasn’t he?) Senator McCain: "It was a terrorist attack. It wasn't the result of a mob being excited. It was a group of jihadists who were well-armed and well-trained and well-equipped, and they decided to attack the consulate in Benghazi and try and kill people. That's far different from what happened in Cairo where a mob was whipped into a frenzy by these people who were talking about this so-called movie that insults Mohammed." As for the Obama administration's handling of the crisis, McCain was almost entirely positive. "I think it was fine. By the way, Secretary of State Hilary Clinton gave a marvelous statement today," said McCain. He did not offer such praise for the Romney campaign’s statements on the events. It’s time to grow up, children. This one’s over and you’re embarrassing yourselves.

Topic.Title: Romney's response to Libya and Egypt...

Message.Msg: Presidential campaigns in this Country are similar to what is done in Military Basic Training, in my opionion. The individual comes in an is stripped of their personal things. Hair gone, the Sargent say give me 20, no you did it wrong. Twenty more. Set up your foot locker this way, and later Sarg comes in and says, no they changed the layout, the soap now goes here. This is done to stress the new recruit, they wil need to be able to react under stress, and basic is a good place to test them . This weeds out those who if allowed to continue, may put themselves, in a situatation, where they, or someone else could be harmed. Similar to this a person who, is acting as his advisors say, or other than themselves sooner or later can flake out. Say things that are not true, trying to act Presidential. React before thinking thoughts through. I beiieve these last moves Romney has made show him under stress. He is not reacting well by the way, better now than later. Later would be too late.

Topic.Title: Barry's Real Employment Plan

Message.Msg: The thought that all this fiat money going through the system, is going to help the poor is laughable. Inflation is alive and well in the supermarket, not to mention at the gas pump. (Printing Billions of dollars each month, reminds me of pre-war Germany, where a loaf of bread set you back a basket of cash). Oil of course, causes transportation cost to skyrocket. The working poor is loosing ground every day. Then you toss in MILLIONS of ILLEGALS, wages have fallen due to the over supply of labor. We have to pray for the poor, especially if they vote for Obama, who believes in making us all dependent on his food stamps. Still hard to believe, Obummer is running commercials where one African American lady remarks to another, that their friend looks so full of life lately. Yes, the other one says she has help. Food Stamps! Latest poll, before Obama came to power in 2008, 25% of the American population called themselves poor folks. Now, after just one term, a full third now classify themselves as poor. JUST BELIEVE, one more term of Obummer, and we can definitely get at least 1/2 of the Country say, they aren't very well off.
